title: Histogram Calculation Function Block for Integer Data
name: LGF_Histogram_DInt
description: The histogram shows the frequency distribution of a sample by class.

input.name: execute
input.description: Activation of the calculation with each positive edge.

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error, TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB and error identification.

output.name: subFunctionStatus
output.description: Status or return value of called FB's, FC's and system blocks

output.name: histValues
output.description: Outputs the calculated values in a two-dimensional array.

in/out.name: values
in/out.description: The array containing the data series that is to be used for the calculation.

status_codes.16#7000: STATUS_NO_CALL: No call of FB. The block waits for activation.
status_codes.16#7001: STATUS_FIRST_CALL: First call of FB after enabling
